org.dotplot.fmatrix
Class TokenType

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.fmatrix.TokenType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TokenType
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

this entity is used to store, modify and access a tokentype and all needed information of this type for the fmatrix.

See Also:
